## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | This order size ensures ample stock to cover forecasted demand with a safety buffer, considering potential demand variations. It avoids exceeding the player's planned purchase, optimizes utilization of available vendor quantities, and allows for multiple purchases in case of high demand. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units less than the player's planned purchase. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.4 days                              |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                   |
| Comments                          | Ordering 30,000 units allows for sufficient stock coverage while maintaining flexibility to replenish as needed.  |
